statements: SELECT * FROM WorkOrders;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM WorkOrders;
SELECT work_order_id, due_date FROM WorkOrders WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM WorkOrders WHERE assigned_worker = 'John Doe';
SELECT product_name, quantity, due_date FROM WorkOrders ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM WorkOrders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY due_date DESC, work_order_id ASC
SELECT product_name, assigned_worker FROM WorkOrders WHERE due_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT work_order_id, quantity FROM WorkOrders WHERE product_name LIKE '%widget%'
SELECT * FROM WorkOrders WHERE assigned_worker = 'John Doe' AND quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM WorkOrders WHERE due_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY quantity DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM work_orders;
SELECT work_order_id, product_id, quantity, due_date FROM work_orders ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT work_order_id, product_id FROM work_orders WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tasks FROM production_tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_description, start_date, completion_date FROM production_tasks WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM work_orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY due_date DESC
SELECT * FROM production_tasks WHERE status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT work_order_id, product_id, due_date FROM work_orders WHERE due_date > '2022-06-01'
SELECT task_id, task_description, status FROM production_tasks WHERE status IN ('Not Started', 'Pending') ORDER BY task_id
SELECT work_order_id, COUNT(task_id) AS tasks_count FROM production_tasks GROUP BY work_order_id HAVING tasks_count > 3
SELECT * FROM work_orders;
SELECT work_order_id, product_name, quantity FROM work_orders WHERE deadline > NOW();
SELECT task_id, task_description, start_time, end_time FROM production_tasks WHERE start_time IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM task_assignments WHERE assigned_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT work_order_id, product_name, quantity, deadline FROM work_orders ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM work_orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_description, start_time FROM production_tasks WHERE end_time IS NULL;
SELECT product_name, quantity, deadline FROM work_orders WHERE deadline > NOW() AND quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT assignment_id, employee_id FROM task_assignments ORDER BY assigned_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT work_order_id, product_name, quantity, deadline FROM work_orders WHERE quantity = 10;
SELECT * FROM WorkOrders;
SELECT order_id, order_name FROM WorkOrders WHERE order_qty > 10;
SELECT order_id, order_qty, order_status FROM WorkOrders WHERE order_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_qty DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Production' AND position = 'Manager';
SELECT schedule_id, order_id, task_id, scheduled_date FROM Schedule ORDER BY scheduled_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_name, order_qty, order_status FROM WorkOrders WHERE order_status = 'completed';
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM ProductionTasks ORDER BY task_description ASC;
SELECT order_id, task_id, scheduled_date FROM Schedule WHERE scheduled_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department, task_description, task_status FROM Employees JOIN ProductionTasks ON Employees.employee_id = ProductionTasks.worker_id;
SELECT * FROM WorkOrders;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM WorkOrders WHERE due_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT task_description, start_date, end_date FROM ProductionTasks WHERE task_status = 'Completed';
SELECT first_name, last_name, position FROM Employees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT workstation_name FROM Workstations WHERE workstation_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM WorkOrders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT task_description, start_date, end_date FROM ProductionTasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT first_name, last_name, position FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT task_id, employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM ProductionLogs WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Workstations WHERE workstation_name LIKE '%Assembly%' ORDER BY workstation_id ASC;
